SceneDescription.name: Hallway - 1F
SceneDescription.description: The vase is clearly a priceless antique. It's incredibly bland and has no remarkable features whatsoever.

condition.additionalDescription:
A set of harp strings hangs from the vase.
Assassin: [Hiding these here is a surprisingly clever idea. Nobody pays attention to the decorations in the hallways around here, and Lord Borkus's harpist has trouble seeing anything more than a foot away from him. If I hadn't spotted these strings, they probably would have gone unnoticed for weeks.]

action.name: Take
action.description: Assassin: [I should probably keep these for now.]

action.name: Back
action.description: Assassin: [Cat gut is probably too weak to be an effective garrote...]
